# rotate(by:)

**Instance Method**

Rotates the entity rotated by the specified quaternion around the origin.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func rotate(by quaternion: Self.Quaternion)
```

## Parameters

- **quaternion**: The quaternion that defines the rotation.
title: rotate(by:)
